name: Symphonia
description:
Embody a violinist and awaken a gigantic, forsaken world in this highly poetic platformer! Using your violin and bow, move towards the core of the realm to understand your role in this universe and play the best Concerto! Key Features : 
  • Plunge into a beautiful 2D platformer with a tight and poetic gameplay.
  • Discover three slumbering zones of Symphonia and play impressive concertos to awake them.
  • Use your violin and bow to bounce around and catapult yourself in the world of Symphonia.
  • Play the violin at any point to activate mechanisms, and enjoy the music.
  • Try and collect all the fragments of music to earn the ultimate title as a musician.



Discover more on our Website and Twitter!
